sourcesContent:
<template>
    <apexChart type="pie" height="300" :options="chartOptions" :series="series"></apexChart>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name:"PieChart",
  data() {
    return{
        series: [44, 55, 13, 43, 22],
          chartOptions: {
            chart: {
              width: 380,
              type: 'pie',
            },
            labels: ['Team A', 'Team B', 'Team C', 'Team D', 'Team E'],
            colors: ["", "#FFBD33", "#33FF5F", "#338DFF", "#8D33FF"], 

            responsive: [{
              breakpoint: 480,
              options: {
                chart: {
                  width: 200
                },
                legend: {
                  position: 'bottom'
                }
              }
            }]
          },
    }
         
  }
  }
</script>
